docs.lead_paragraph: Educator, birth control advocate in the 1920's, liberal skeptic and cancer researcher, Dr. Clarence Cook Little was rarely unembroiled in controversy. This was not because he was a contentious or cantankerous scientist so much as because his views, at the times he uttered them, tended to be nonconforming.
